Synopsis: Converts a ScriptBlock into an array of strings, each representing a line of the script block.
Description: This function takes a ScriptBlock as input and converts it into an array of strings, where each string represents a line of the script block.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
ConvertFrom-ScriptBlock -ScriptBlock {
    $Variable1 = "Value1"
    $Variable2 = "Value2"
    Write-Host "Hello, World!"
}
This example will output an array containing the following strings:
$Variable1 = "Value1"
$Variable2 = "Value2"
Write-Host "Hello, World!"
